references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational concept of Bayesian persuasion, which is the central topic of the current paper.
This paper is highly relevant as it addresses online Bayesian persuasion, a closely related problem to the one studied in the current paper.
This paper is important as it is one of the first to study online learning in Bayesian persuasion, which is the setting addressed by the current paper.
This work is highly relevant as it introduced the algorithmic approach to Bayesian persuasion which the current paper expands upon.

references.paper_title: Learning and approximating the optimal strategy to commit to
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the current paper because it introduces online learning for Stackelberg games which is a related problem and whose techniques are extended in this work.
